edge: Arjun Kapoor portrays the character of Madhav Jha, a Bihari boy who hardly knows to speak English and falls in love with Riya Somani.
Shraddha Kapoor portrays the character of Riya Somani Jha, a rich Delhi girl who comes from an entrepreneur background, falls in love with Madhav Jha, and becomes his wife.
Vikrant Massey portrays the character of Shailesh Khanna, Madhav Jha's colleague who is protective of him.
Rhea Chakraborty portrays the character of Anshika Patel, who loves Madhav Jha but lets him go for Riya.
Seema Biswas portrays the character of Rani Sahiba, Madhav Jha's mother who runs a school in Bihar.
Shree Dhar Dubey portrays the character of Hemant the estate agent.
Anisa Butt portrays the character of Rutvi, Sailesh's wife.
Jiten Lalwani portrays the character of Basketball Coach.

node_2: bar owner in new york city, usa
edge: Adam Davenport appears digitally superimposed as a likeness in the movie, portraying the character of Bar Owner in New York City, USA.
Dalip Sondhi portrays the character of Mr. Somani/Riya's Father.
Sujata Sehgal portrays the character of Mrs. Somani/Riya's Mother.

node_2: tvisha jha/daughter of riya and madhav
edge: Tvisha Shah portrays the character of Tvisha Jha, who is the daughter of Riya and Madhav.
Kashvi Kothari portrays the character of Shabnam, a village girl.
